### getMatchingMegaReg() {#a27574b6eff0c19ab7525347e22c22c27}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned M68kRegisterInfo::getMatchingMegaReg (unsigned Reg, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterclass">TargetRegisterClass</a> &#42; RC) const</>}>
Return a mega-register of the specified register Reg so its sub-register of index SubIdx is Reg, its super(or mega) Reg.

In other words it will return a register that is not direct super register but still shares physical register with Reg. NOTE not sure about the term though.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/m68k/m68kregisterinfo-h/#l00068">68</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/m68k/m68kregisterinfo-h">M68kRegisterInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/m68k/m68kregisterinfo-cpp/#l00076">76</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/m68k/m68kregisterinfo-cpp">M68kRegisterInfo.cpp</a>.

### getSpillRegisterOrder() {#a7b51ebfc253ad6a0dd7c7363752c530d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="int M68kRegisterInfo::getSpillRegisterOrder (unsigned Reg) const">
Return spill order index of a register, if there is none then trap.

### BasePtr {#afcd46be9519d5bd6201842c0df9a7a8f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::M68kRegisterInfo::BasePtr">
Physical register used as a base ptr in complex stack frames.

I.e., when we need a 3rd base, not just SP and FP, due to variable size stack objects.
